name: Happy Monday!
description:
It's another day in the office as the only intern, full of tasks no one else wants to do. Start by talking to the receptionist to see who needs you first, navigate the changing corridors of the corporate office, and try to find your coworkers amidst the babble and chatter of the (mildly) absurd company of S'Baguette.

Control:

WASD to control character movement

Mouse to control camera angle

Enter to interact with characters

Credits: 

Team:

  • Alina - Art
  • Amanda - Programming
